title: Southron Invaders (6C81)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	5
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	10
Vitality:	3
Site:	4
Game Text:	Southron. Ambush (1). When you play this minion, you may spot another Southron to play a minion with ambush from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'So when you said “Men out of the South, all in red and gold,” I said “were there any oliphaunts?” For if there was, I was going to take a look….'”
Rarity:	C
